reportparamfield_meta.sql:
SELECT '99' AS regiondetailsid, 'ALL' region FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT @rownum := @rownum+1 regiondetailsid, b.branchtype FROM (
SELECT DISTINCT branchtype FROM branchmast
) b, (SELECT @rownum:=0) r

SELECT a.igdetailid, a.subgroupid FROM igdetail a WHERE a.groupsidc='FE-OP' AND a.igdetailid IN 
(SELECT c.crop FROM cropcycle c)

SELECT  '1'  AS branchmastid,  'ALL'  AS branchname FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT b.branchmastid, b.branchname FROM branchmast b WHERE b.branchtype = :sregion
ORDER BY 1

SELECT  '1'  AS amasterid,  'ALL'  AS areaname FROM DUAL
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT a.amasterid, a.areaname FROM amaster a, igdetail b, cropcycle c  
WHERE a.amasterid = c.areaname AND b.igdetailid = c.crop AND b.subgroupid = :scrop
AND a.amasterid IN (SELECT b2.areaname FROM branchmast b1, bmamaster b2 WHERE b1.branchmastid = b2.branchmastid AND b1.branchname =:sbranch)

query_meta.sq:
SELECT f.sno, t.ttype, UPPER(t.trntype) trntype, t.mapname, a1.branchname, a3.areaname, SUM(t.debit) debit, 0 credit 
FROM frmtrans t, branchmast a1, ftrntype f, cropcycle a6, igdetail a10, bmamaster a2, amaster a3 
WHERE UPPER(t.trntype)=UPPER(f.trntype) AND t.branchid=a1.branchmastid AND t.cropcycleid = a6.cropcycleid AND a6.crop=a10.igdetailid
AND a1.branchmastid = a2.branchmastid AND a2.areaname=a3.amasterid AND a6.areaname = a3.amasterid
AND a1.branchtype = :sregion AND a10.subgroupid = :scrop
AND (a1.branchname = :sbranch OR 'ALL' = :sbranch) AND (a3.areaname = :sarea OR :sarea = 'ALL' )
AND t.docdate BETWEEN  DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(:sdt,'%d-%b-%y'),'%Y-%m-%d')   AND  DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(:edt,'%d-%b-%y'),'%Y-%m-%d') 
GROUP BY f.sno, t.ttype, UPPER(t.trntype), t.mapname, a1.branchname, a3.areaname
UNION ALL
SELECT f.sno, t.ttype, UPPER(t.trntype) trntype, t.mapname, a1.branchname, a3.areaname, 0 debit, SUM(t.credit)  credit 
FROM frmtrans2 t, branchmast a1, ftrntype f, cropcycle a6, igdetail a10, bmamaster a2, amaster a3 
WHERE UPPER(t.trntype)=UPPER(f.trntype) AND t.branchid=a1.branchmastid AND t.cropcycleid = a6.cropcycleid AND a6.crop=a10.igdetailid
AND a1.branchmastid = a2.branchmastid AND a2.areaname=a3.amasterid AND a6.areaname = a3.amasterid
AND a1.branchtype = :sregion AND a10.subgroupid = :scrop
AND (a1.branchname = :sbranch OR 'ALL' = :sbranch ) AND (a3.areaname = :sarea OR :sarea = 'ALL' )
AND t.docdate BETWEEN  DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(:sdt,'%d-%b-%y'),'%Y-%m-%d')   AND  DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(:edt,'%d-%b-%y'),'%Y-%m-%d') 
GROUP BY f.sno, t.ttype, UPPER(t.trntype), t.mapname, a1.branchname, a3.areaname
ORDER BY 5,6,1,2
